title: The Story of Tol
description: After committing an unforgivable crime, Tol is taken into the folds of an underground society and "reeducated". This story includes descriptions of sexual relations between adultmen, and between an adult man and a 16/17-year-old teenager, includingbondage and SM. WARNING: If the law in your jurisdiction says that you're too young to be reading this, then I suggest very strongly that you should obey the law. People who are likely to be offended by the subject matter are respectfully advised not to read it.Approx 97,100 words complete
author: Jack Rowan
